      • runAsJobOwner

        public abstract <T> T runAsJobOwner(Callable<T> c)
                             throws IgniteCheckedException
        Executes a callable on behalf of the job owner. In case of embedded task execution the implementation of this method will use classes loaded by the ClassLoader this HadoopTaskContext loaded with.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type of the Callable.
        Parameters:
        c - The callable.
        Returns:
        The result of the callable.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - On any error in callable.

        Callback invoked from mapper thread when map is finished.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
